part_left.title: softsourced has it.
part_left.desc:
softsourced has become a go-to tech company for ambitious small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), including startups.
Whether you need us as project lead or surrogate, our team of designers and developers provides services all along a project lifecycle and is ready to take on yet another success story.
We are a trusted partner in the development of Mobile Applications, E-Commerce Websites and APIs.

part_right.title: The nature of our services is two-fold:

desc.title: PROJECT LEAD
desc.desc: We carry out your entire project for you. From start to finish.

desc.title: PROJECT SURROGATE
desc.desc: You take the project lead. We support you where needed.
